                "`p` is initialized to the address of the first element of an unnamed array of two ints.\n\nThe compound literal is an lvalue.               ["A fictive function "],
              ["drawline", [["c"]]],
              [" receives two arguments of type "],
              ["struct point", [["c"]]],
              [". The first has coordinate values "],
              ["x == 1", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["y == 1", [["c"]]],
              [", whereas the second has "],

              [" and "],

              [" compound literal can be specified using "],
              ["const", [["c"]]],
              [" qualifier as "],
